Hi {!Opportunity.Partner_Sub_Agent_Contact__c},
Unfortunately, your sales opportunity {!Opportunity.Name} was Closed Lost due to {!Opportunity.Loss_Reason__c}. Let us know if this opportunity presents itself again. We look forward to working on other opportunities in the future.
Thanks, Channel Support
